thread.title: David
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by David

author: David
title: David
text: I recently ordered frames, acrylic and mounting and mat boards for 14 different prints and art pieces in my home. They arrived quickly and well packaged. A single mat board was missing from the shipment and American Frame quickly remedied the error. This is the third time I've ordered from American Frame and I will continue to use them in the future.
